main event: On 25 Nov 55, a round, white and yellow glowing object was observed descending over Lomax, Illinois.
interesting points: The object was described as having a bull shape with four points,There was a total observation time of 15 minutes,The sighting was made using binoculars,One confirmed witness was a section chief,The report suggests the phenomenon could be a sunspot or parhelia.
sighted object: round, white and yellow glowing object
witness description: a section chief, a farmer, and another individual
